name: The Convulsion
description:
The Convulsion,  an open beta game designed by the class of 2024 from the Kew-forest School. You are Douglas, an average cop who is being attacked by a  monster  granny that follows you throughout  the levels, waiting to kill you as you race to the finish line. Join us and our grade as we explore this wacky world known as the Convulsion.

Features:

  • Run and jump through the levels
  • Collect points along the way
  • Encounter launch pads and moving platforms
  • Dodge fire and run from the granny
